alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Neshoba; Noxubee; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:51PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Noxubee, northwestern Kemper, southeastern Winston and northeastern Neshoba Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 650 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Preston, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bluff Springs around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
